results.overview: After a freak, fatal accident, the soul Karl—aka The Address Book Killer—ends up trapped in the electrical grid. He targets Terry and her son for his next victims, turning home technology against them as deadly weapons.
results.title: Ghost in the Machine

results.overview: Lonely Noreen daydreams of being whisked away by a square-jawed cowboy, but her reality is far more mundane. She lives virtually enslaved on the family farm in the North of England, with only her father's demeaning comments about her weight as company. So it's no wonder that she pays attention to the first thing that's ever shown her any kindness, even if it is an abandoned 60 year-old talking tractor. A friendship quickly develops, Noreen sets about restoring the tractor, and together they hatch a plan to turn the tables on her father.
results.title: Ghost in the Machine

results.overview: Ghost in the Machine is a modern-day Supernatural Thriller set in London.
results.title: Ghost in the Machine

results.original_title: The Police ‎– Live Ghost In The Machine
results.overview: Recorded live at Gateshead in England, UK, 31 July, 1982.
results.title: The Police ‎– Live Ghost In The Machine

results.original_title: The Police: Ghost In The Machine Tour - Live At Gateshead 1982
results.overview: This video captures The Police during one of their best performances. At the time (1982) The Police were on a high with many fans across the world, but they hadn't quite hit the peak of their superstardom - that was at least another album away.
results.title: The Police: Ghost In The Machine Tour - Live At Gateshead 1982

results.overview: In the near future where humanoid robots are common in society, the mob reprograms a female android to think and feel in order to use it as a contract killer. This has dangerous consequences as she develops a relationship with her creator while also slowly becoming a murderous psychopath.
results.title: Mind and Machine

results.overview: Wildly grief-stricken over the accidental death of his parents, young techno-geek Cody (Sasha Andreev) cobbles together an electrical device that he hopes will bring the spirits of mom and dad back from beyond the grave. But the machine's power and Cody's deepening obsession threaten the safety of his only remaining family: his younger brother, James (Max Hauser). Matt Osterman directs this ghostly sci-fi thriller that also stars Matthew Feeney.
results.title: Ghost from the Machine

results.overview: Six young people find an old VCR in an abandoned French house. The machine turns out to be magical... or is it cursed?
results.title: House of VHS

results.overview: Documentary charting the history of the supernatural on British TV, revisiting classic ghost stories and controversial shows. Contributors include Derren Brown and Yvette Fielding.
results.title: Ghosts in the Machine
